name: movie-library-app
description: Movie library application with React frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.docker:backend: cd backend && docker build -t movies-backend . && docker run -p 3001:3001 --env-file .env movies-backend
